decision_conditions: Within 6 months of cessation of the use and 'operation' of solar panels and equipment on the site, the panels and any external equipment and paraphernalia assicated therewith shall be removed.Reason - to satisfactorily protect the character and appearance of the area. To comply with Policy DM10 of RBK Core Strategy (2012). Retention of obsolete equipment would be harmful to the immediate setting of the site.
description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment to Planning Permission ref: 23/02923/HOU (Erection of single storey side and first floor side extensions. Internal alterations including conversion of garage to habitable room. Alterations to fenestrations. Alterations to front garden landscaping.). Amendment to install photovoltaic solar panel array on the roof of the first floor side extension and associated alterations to the roof slope.
